thread.title: EastEnders’ bad boy Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll
thread.title_full: EastEnders’ bad boy Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll

author: ekirby
title: EastEnders’ bad boy Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll
text:
TV Magazine dyer alarm EastEnders’ bad boy Danny Dyer on the brink as pals fear booze and drugs are taking their toll 
Party animal is taking an indefinite break from his £400k-a-year role to get over 'exhaustion' but sources close to self-proclaimed caner admit he may have left BBC soap for good Exclusive By ALLY FARRELL, Senior Bizarre Reporter 17th February 2017, 10:01 pm
